threads.subject: Issue with LED Lights on CyberKnight Gloves

emails.subject: Sizing Issue with TacticalPro Gloves
emails.body_text:
Hi there,

I recently purchased a pair of TacticalPro gloves (Order: GA-12345), and they feel a bit snug. I'm not sure if I ordered the wrong size or if they just run small? I usually wear a size large in other brands, but these feel tighter around my fingers. Can you please guide me on how to exchange them for a bigger size?

Thanks,
Ben Thompson
ben.thompson@email.com
emails.body_html:
Hi there,

I recently purchased a pair of TacticalPro gloves (Order: GA-12345), and they feel a bit snug. I'm not sure if I ordered the wrong size or if they just run small? I usually wear a size large in other brands, but these feel tighter around my fingers. Can you please guide me on how to exchange them for a bigger size?

Thanks,
Ben Thompson
ben.thompson@email.com

emails.subject: Order Delay for DragonScale Gauntlets
emails.body_text:
Hello,

I placed an order for the DragonScale Gauntlets (GA-67890) back on July 10th, and I was expecting them to arrive by now, but it's already been over 6 weeks. Could you provide me with an update on my order status? I'm really looking forward to receiving them as they are a birthday gift for my husband.

Appreciate your help!
Sarah K.
sarah.k@email.com

emails.subject: Break-In Period for CyberKnight Collection
emails.body_text:
Hi GauntletAIron,

I just got my CyberKnight gloves (GA-11223) and they look amazing! However, they are a bit stiff. I read something about a break-in period for leather gloves, but how long should I expect this to last? Anything specific I should do to make them more comfortable?

Thanks for the guidance!
Chris J.
chris.j@email.com
emails.body_html:
Hi GauntletAIron,

I just got my CyberKnight gloves (GA-11223) and they look amazing! However, they are a bit stiff. I read something about a break-in period for leather gloves, but how long should I expect this to last? Anything specific I should do to make them more comfortable?

Thanks for the guidance!
Chris J.
chris.j@email.com

emails.subject: Leather Care Instructions Needed
emails.body_text:
Hey Support,

I own a pair of DragonScale Gauntlets (GA-33445), and I want to make sure I'm taking care of them properly. Could you send me the best practices for cleaning and maintaining the leather? I really want these to last as long as possible!

Thanks a ton!
Emma Lee
emma.lee@email.com
emails.body_html:
Hey Support,

I own a pair of DragonScale Gauntlets (GA-33445), and I want to make sure I'm taking care of them properly. Could you send me the best practices for cleaning and maintaining the leather? I really want these to last as long as possible!

Thanks a ton!
Emma Lee
emma.lee@email.com

emails.subject: Interested in Custom Fitting Services
emails.body_text:
Hello,

I’ve been looking at your WorkForce Heavy gloves (GA-55667), but I've got unique hand proportions. Do you offer any custom fitting services? I'd love to know more about how that works before making a purchase.

Thanks!
Mark R.
mark.r@email.com

emails.body_text:

I’ve recently bought the RoadGuard gloves (GA-77889) and noticed some scratches on the metal parts. What’s the best way to polish them without damaging the material? Thanks for your help!

Cheers,
Jess

emails.subject: ANGRY: Poor Customer Service!
emails.body_text:
To whom it may concern,

I am extremely frustrated with your service! I’ve been waiting for my order (GA-44556) for over a month, and no one has bothered to respond to my previous messages! This is unacceptable! I expect a proper update ASAP or I will take further action!

Sincerely,
Alex B.
alexb@email.com

emails.subject: Sales Inquiry - Bulk Order Discount
emails.body_text:
Hello,

I work for a local police department, and we are interested in purchasing a bulk order of the TacticalPro Series gloves (GA-99887). Do you offer any discounts for larger orders? If so, could you provide details on prices and how to proceed?

Thank you!
Officer Kate
officer.kate@email.com

emails.subject: Legal Inquiry Regarding Order
emails.body_text:
Dear GauntletAIron,

I am writing to address a serious issue regarding my order (GA-22334). I believe your assembly process may have been negligent, resulting in my gloves falling apart after only two weeks. I would like to discuss potential compensation. Please respond promptly.

Best,
Liam S.
liam.s@email.com
emails.body_html:
Dear GauntletAIron,

I am writing to address a serious issue regarding my order (GA-22334). I believe your assembly process may have been negligent, resulting in my gloves falling apart after only two weeks. I would like to discuss potential compensation. Please respond promptly.

Best,
Liam S.
liam.s@email.com

emails.subject: Partnership Inquiry for Promotional Events
emails.body_text:
Hello GauntletAIron Team,

I represent a local motorcycle club, and we’re planning a series of events. We’d love to explore potential partnership opportunities with GauntletAIron. Your RoadGuard Series gloves would be perfect for our members! Can we set up a call to discuss?

Looking forward to hearing from you!
Tom R.
tom.r@email.com

Hello GauntletAIron Team,

I represent a local motorcycle club, and we’re planning a series of events. We’d love to explore potential partnership opportunities with GauntletAIron. Your RoadGuard Series gloves would be perfect for our members! Can we set up a call to discuss?

Looking forward to hearing from you!
Tom R.

emails.body_text:

I have a pair of WorkForce Heavy gloves (GA-98765) that I purchased last year, and they are starting to show some wear. Can you let me know what the warranty covers? I’d like to understand if the issues I’m facing are eligible for replacement.

Jeff D.

emails.subject: Issue with LED Lights on CyberKnight Gloves
emails.body_text:
Hey,

I just got my CyberKnight gloves (GA-56789), and the LED lights aren’t working. I’ve checked the batteries, but they still won’t turn on. Can you guide me on what to do next? I’d hate to have to send them back!

Best,
Mike P.
mike.p@email.com

Hey,

I just got my CyberKnight gloves (GA-56789), and the LED lights aren’t working. I’ve checked the batteries, but they still won’t turn on. Can you guide me on what to do next? I’d hate to have to send them back!

Best,
Mike P.
mike.p@email.com

emails.subject: Gloves Running Small?
emails.body_text:
Hi!

I recently got my TacticalPro gloves (GA-54321), and I feel like they are super tight on my hands. Is this normal? I’ve worn a large size before without issue, but these seem to be a lot smaller! What should I do? 

Thanks,
Liam W.
liam.w@email.com

emails.subject: Feedback on last order
emails.body_text:
Hi GauntletAIron Team,

I just received my RoadGuard gloves (GA-11112), and while the quality is impressive, I did notice a few scratches on the metal parts. It’s a bit disappointing as I expected perfection for the price I paid. Could you help me with this?

Thank you,
Rita J.
